name: ClickMagic
tag_list: advertising, affiliate-marketing, ad-network, real-time-bidding, rtb, performance-marketing, latam
overview: ClickMagic is the leading Affiliate & Performance Marketing Company in Latin America since 2009 with presence in major markets such as Brazil, Mexico, Argentina, Colombia, Chile and Peru. ClickMagic provides advertisers with high quality and high converting traffic from the desired audiences for their performance campaigns, while helping publishers monetize their inventory through a range of campaign options. The company is backed by investors including Aurus Capital, KMG and Equitas. More information can be obtained by visiting ClickMagic online at www.clickmagiclatam.com.
